info.title: OpenBAS API
info.description: Software under open source licence designed to plan and conduct exercises

tags.name: Tag rules management
tags.description: Endpoints to manage TagRules. TagRules are used to automatically add tags to elements depending on rules

put.description:
Change the password of a user
**Required role :** ***ROLE_ADMIN***

get.description:
Get a team
**Required role :** ***ROLE_ADMIN*** or ***ROLE_USER***
**Special Requirement :** You need to be an admin or an observer to call this endpoint

put.description:
Update an existing team
**Required role :** ***ROLE_ADMIN*** or ***ROLE_USER***
**Special Requirement :** You need to be an admin or a planner to call this endpoint

delete.description:
Delete an existing team
**Required role :** ***ROLE_ADMIN*** or ***ROLE_USER***
**Special Requirement :** You need to be an admin or a planner to call this endpoint

get.description:
Get the list of players of a team
**Required role :** ***ROLE_ADMIN*** or ***ROLE_USER***
**Special Requirement :** You need to be an admin or an observer to call this endpoint

200.description: The list of players of the team

put.description:
Update the list of users of a team team
**Required role :** ***ROLE_ADMIN*** or ***ROLE_USER***
**Special Requirement :** You need to be an admin or a planner to call this endpoint

get.description:
Get TagRule by Id
**Required role :** ***ROLE_ADMIN*** or ***ROLE_USER***

put.description:
Tag and Asset Groups needs to exists
**Required role :** ***ROLE_ADMIN***

get.summary: Retrieve the latest exercise by external reference ID (example: a report ID
Get the payload ready to be executed
get.description: This endpoint is invoked by implants to retrieve a payload command that's pre-configured and ready for execution.

get.summary: Get Inject Expectations for a Specific Source and type Prevention
get.description: Retrieves inject expectations of agents installed on an asset for a given source ID and type Prevention.

get.summary: Get Inject Expectations for a Specific Source and type Detection
get.description: Retrieves inject expectations of agents installed on an asset for a given source ID and type detection.

get.summary: Get Inject Expectations for a Specific Source
get.description: Retrieves inject expectations of agents installed on an asset for a given source ID.
Downloads the OpenBAS agent package for the specified platform and architecture.

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: Target platform for the agent package (e.g., windows, linux, mac). Case insensitive.

parameters.name: architecture
parameters.description: Target architecture for the agent package (e.g., x86, x64, arm). Case insensitive.

get.description: Generates the installation command for the OpenBAS agent for the specified platform and token.

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: Target platform for the agent installation (e.g., windows, linux, mac). Case insensitive.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Unique token associated with the agent installation.

get.description: Downloads the OpenBAS agent executable for a specified platform and architecture.

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: Target platform for the agent installation (e.g., windows, linux, mac). Case insensitive.

parameters.name: architecture
parameters.description: Target architecture for the agent installation (e.g., x86_64, arm64). Case insensitive.

platform_whitemark.description: 'true' if the platform has the whitemark activated

executor_caldera_enable.description: True if the Caldera Executor is enabled

executor_tanium_enable.description: True if the Tanium Executor is enabled
